summary: A bachelor's life is interrupted by the appearance of a teenager who claims to be his son.
cast: Bill Bixby|Diane Baker|Jack Albertson|Ann Sothern|Karen Jensen|Darrell Larson|Jeff Donnell|Tom Bosley|Robert H. Harris|Judy Strangis|Robert Buckingham|Dick Cherney|Sig Frohlich|Bob Harks|Robert Hitchcock|Kathryn Janssen|Norman Stevans
keywords: teenager|bachelor|illegitimate son|abc movie of the week
title: Enhorabuena, ¡ha sido niño!
